fields.title: Monthly performance
fields.description:
January 27
February 24
March 31
April 28
May 26
June 30
July 28
August 25
September 29
October 27
November 24
December - to be determined
Friday, January 3, 2025 at 9:17:18aAM
===
Hi everyone.
Happy New Year.
I'm working on some scheduling for 2025 this afternoon.  Please note below the dates that I am confirming with Barclay House.  Our plan is still to go there on the last Monday of each month.  If there need to be any changes I will let you know.
Pierre, please add these dates to Trello for us.  Thank you.
HJT
 
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Heather J Topps <hjtopps@gmail.com>
Date: Thu, Jan 2, 2025 at 3:04 PM
Subject: 2025 Schedule
To: Alexandra Parker <Alexandra.Parker@barclayhouse.ca>
 
 
Hi Alex.
Happy New Year.  I hope you were able to get some time off over the holiday season to relax and have fun.
I'm looking at our schedule for 2025 and would like to confirm our sessions at Barclay House.  The dates that fall on the last Monday of each month are as follows:
January 27
February 24
March 31
April 28
May 26
June 30
July 28
August 25
September 29
October 27
November 24
December - to be determined
We should also confirm that we are still doing our performances between 2:15 p.m. - 3:15 p.m.
Thanks, Alex.
HJT

fields.title: Monthly performance
fields.description:
Wednesday, May 21, 2025 at 9:34:24aPM
===
Hi everyone.
I told you recently that Eastholme Home For The Aged would like us every 2nd month.  They wanted us on July 4th but I am unavailable.  They have offered us the following dates:
Friday, August 1st (1:30 p.m. - 2:30 p.m.)
Friday, September 5th (1:30 - 2:30 p.m.)
Friday, November 7th (1:30 p.m. - 2:30 p.m.)
Address:  62 Big Bend Avenue, Powassan
Event:  birthday celebration for the residents.
Arrival Time:  1/2 hour before performance start time.
Attire:  either short or long-sleeved Uke4ia shirts with black bottoms.  Shorts are fine.
Chairs:  will be provided.
Pierre, would you please create a column in Trello for Eastholme (like you have for Marina Point, Empire Living Centre and Barclay House) so that everyone can see the schedule for this facility for the remainder of the year?
These dates are several months away so please be sure to submit your availability as we get closer to them.
Thank you.
HJT

===

 

Hi everyone.

Please note below the dates that I am confirming with Marina Point.  Our plan is still to go there on the 3rd Tuesday of each month from 2:00 p.m. - 3:00 p.m..  If there need to be any changes I will let you know.

Pierre, please add these dates to Trello for us.  Thank you.

HJT
